article:
'Abuse' is the improper usage or treatment of an entity, often to unfairly or
improperly gain benefit. Abuse can come in many forms, such as: physical or
verbal maltreatment, injury, sexual assault, violation, rape, unjust practices;
wrongful practice or custom; offense; crime, or otherwise verbal
aggression.
categories: Roman Catholic Church sex abuse cases in the United States
headings: Power and control in abusive relationships
